ygData.subject: Re: Swamping at Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: Usual... ... From: Alex  Last weekend, saturday. Leshrec, Trifrost and I was suposed to go to Faydwek. I was looking forward to it. too
ygData.messageBody:
Usual...
----- Original Message -----
From: Alex <leealex@...>
Last weekend, saturday. Leshrec, Trifrost and I was suposed to go to
Faydwek. I was looking forward to it. too bad the ship didnt come. it was
"under repair"

>>Call a GM, my friend was given a free transportation from Freeport to
Qeynos. Wheew...surely saved him alot of travelling time. Haha, but make
sure to be really polite.

Let me know if any of u guys r keen on any of this expedition.
Hit Frogglocks, get woven and mesh and get out. I should think that Guk is
a whole day trip of 6 hrs(real Time), including hunting. Getting there is
pretty fast. about 15 mins(real time).

>>6 hours will get you very little. Not enough to go around. Trying to get
netted armour as loot is hard enough. I believe in just saving up and then
buy it from some merchant. BTW, Guk has a reputation for being an easy
dungeon near the first few areas. Then its hell...especially with the
trains.
